title: Kreator - 1987 - Terrible Certainty [320kbs] ~~Renovatio~~
description:
Terrible Certainty is the third studio album by thrash metal band Kreator released in 1987 through Noise Records. It was released on cd, cassette, black vinyl, and as a limited edition red vinyl.
